summary: Adds 2 Dwemer Horses Companions (with sounds and voice) near the Markath Stable + 3 Summonable Dwemer Horses
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Dwemer Horses Companions SE[/b][/size][/color] [color=#00ff00]version 1.0[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional file: Esp version Fr.[/color]


Adds 2 Dwemer Horses Companions (with sounds and voice) near the Markath Stable + 3 Summonable Dwemer Horses

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Zw8f0wz.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]COMPANIONS[/size][/b][/color] (You cannot ride on the companions)

[color=#ff0000][b][size=3]Dwemer Horse[/size][/b][/color] Sounds: [i]Dwarven Centurion [/i]- Voice: [i]Male Brute[/i]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=3]Dwemer Horse Dog[/size][/b][/color] Sounds: [i]Dwarven Spider [/i]


You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with these horses

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[img]https://i.imgur.com/2SujEbM.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]SUMMONABLE MOUNTS[/size][/color][/b]

You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list when you launch the game to obtain the 4 books

You can find the 4 Spells tomes (Dwemer Horse, Spectral Dwemer Horse, Horse Dog, Dismiss) at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=768346Farengar.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/768346Farengar.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#ff8c00]Razorpony[/color] for the Dwemer Horse in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33321 ]Dwemer Steam Horse [/url]("Free modders resource" and "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

[color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshe of the Dwarven BigDog in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)
author: gg77

files.name: Esp version Fr pour Dwemer Horses Companions 1.0
